function.description:
Returns a randomized value based on the optional parameter value.
If an integer argument N is provided the return value is a random integer between 0 (inclusive) and N (exclusive). If a list argument is provided, the result is a random entry from the list. If no parameter or a negative number is provided, a random floating point number between 0 and 1 will be generated.

example.title: Get a number between 1 and 6 (inclusive)
Get a random item from a list
Get a random number between 0 and 1
